name: Creepy Crawlies (Zirk Coetsee)
description:
Shoot your way through hordes of patroling Warrior Bugs. Search for and destroy all 14 nests and remember to shoot them in the glowy bits. Use your automatic laser gun or shotgun to destroy enemies and nests.

Game Inspiration: Based on Gamedev.tv's Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D course

Music:

Main tracks: 

Space Music Pack: By Goose Ninja

 https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack

Sound Effects:

Laser gun: https://freesound.org/s/321102/

Shotgun: https://freesound.org/s/258194/

Empty clip: https://freesound.org/s/448989/

Enemy Sounds: 

Monster Sound Effects Vol.1: By Ririsaurus

 https://ririsaurus.itch.io/monster-sound-effects-vol1/download/eyJpZCI6MTU2MTYwN...

Coding:  Zirk Coetsee

3D Art: Zirk Coetsee

UI: Zirk Coetsee

Environment and setting: Zirk Coetsee

How to play:

Keyboard:

  • W/A/S/D to move the character
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Left shift to sprint

Mouse Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button to aim the weapon
  • Right Mouse Button to shoot the weapon while aiming
  • Scroll wheel to switch weapons
